document.full_text: bahrain's sunni king has ordered a state of emergency to be lifted from june 1, after imposing it following weeks of shi'ite-led street protests in the gulf arab kingdom, the state news agency said on sunday.
document.title: bahrain to lift state of emergency on june 1
lines_and_colors: bahrain's sunni king has ordered a state of emergency to be lifted from june 1, after imposing it following weeks of shi'ite-led street protests in the gulf arab kingdom, the state news agency said on sunday.
